item.title: Welcome to the new Medicine Accelerator ticker!
iAchieve July Release - A wave of enhancements is on the way
Kudos to Melba Simon on her lead-author publication in Chemical and Engineering Technology.
The team achieved the first successful direct crystallization of NXE0033744 (Form 2), unlocking a project extension to optimize for scalability.
Well done to Cillian, Israel, Jacek, Revathy, Alina and Guangyang.
